steps.name: Then  user logged in with admin role
Given  user on the customer page
When  user enter valid information on search textbox
Set text Thanh_13062023 on By.xpath: (//input[contains(@placeholder,'Search')])[2] and press key 
Scroll to element [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (e1d67cd13632179fcca02710bc03c326)] -> xpath: //table//tbody/tr[1]/td[3]]
Scroll to element [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (e1d67cd13632179fcca02710bc03c326)] -> xpath: //table//tbody/tr[2]/td[3]]
And  user click on delete information in table
Then  user confirm delete information in table
